title: Why Does Helen Koch Commit Serious Vehicle Theft?
original_title: Warum Begeht Helen Koch Schweren Kraftwagendiebstahl?
description: Cranky teacher Helen and notorious problem student Mia hate the social roles they were assigned by the institution of highschool. When a seemingly harmless conflict between them escalates, the boundaries of their identity constructs and those of the cinematic narrative are blown.
